channel.title: ~[Project RsmScape II]~
channel.description:
[center][u][b]RsmScape II[/b][/u][/center] [center]By: PuresPwnage (Leetya)[/center] Currently recruiting for a brand new project called Project RsmScape II. The project will start from scratch, and will have its own client and server, possibly webclient. [b]Positions Available[/b] [b]Server Coders[/b] 1. Waffles!! 2. muhascape owner 3. 4. 5. [b]Server In-Game Moderator[/b] 1. 2. 3. [b]Forum Moderator[/b] 1. Waffles!! 2. muhascape owner 3. 4. [b]Forum Recruiter[/b] 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. [b]Client Coder[/b] 1. Digzey 2. 3. 4. [b]Item Updater[/b] 1. muhascape owner 2. [b]Batch Coder[/b] 1. 2. Project RsmScape II might have some more spots available soon. Please check in.
[b][center]Application:[/center] 1.) MoparScape Forums Username: 2.) Position Wanted: 3.) Experience: 4.) Have you worked on any servers before? 5.) Why should I accept you?

item.title: ~[Project RsmScape II]~
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Eh, I’ve got some extra time.

1.) MoparScape Forums Username: I didn’t study!
2.) Position Wanted: Forum Mod and Coder
3.) Experience: I’ve been coding for some time now
4.) Have you worked on any servers before? Mine, which is a few.
5.) Why should I accept you? Good luck finding someone else willing to join your project that knows what they’re doing. Convinicing enough?

Read full topic
